 2011-00802011-02-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations(1220 - Enhanced Labelling for Food Allergen and Gluten Sources and Added Sulphites)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1220 - ENHANCED LABELLING FOR FOOD ALLERGEN AND GLUTEN SOURCES AND ADDED SULPHITES), in order to enhance the labelling of prepackaged products and that information regarding the presence of food allergens, gluten and sulphites be shown on the product label in simple and consistent terminology.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0028 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
AttachmentsAttachment
